name: 巴林特·丹尼尔·索斯
awards: 2025年 第75届柏林国际电影节 视点单元 最佳影片 (提名) 逆生长
name_full: 巴林特·丹尼尔·索斯 Bálint Dániel Sós
introduction: The director, screenwriter and author was born in Budapest, Hungary in 1977. After completing a BA in aesthetics at the city’s Eötvös Loránd University, he began his career directing numerous commercials. He is the co-founder of the Kinopravda directors’ collective which, since 2014, has established itself as one of the major players in the international advertising industry. In parallel to his commercial work, he has always written short stories, two of which he has made into short films: Grand Prix and Creamy both screened at international festivals. Minden Rendben is his debut feature film.
